definition: fault (geology)/CL:道[dao4],個|个[ge4]/(fig.) gap/rupture (in the transmission of some skill)/(tomography) cross-sectional
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
reverse fault (geology)/compression fault, where one block pushes over the other at dip of less than 45 degrees
PET, positron emission tomography (medical imaging method)

pinyin: zheng4 dian4 zi3 zhao4 she4 duan4 ceng2 she4 ying3
zheng4 dian4 zi3 fa1 she4 duan4 ceng2 zhao4 xiang1 shu4

containing_words.word: 正電子發射計算機斷層

definition: San Andreas Fault, California/also written 聖安德列斯斷層|圣安德列斯断层
pinyin: Sheng4 an1 de5 lie4 si1 Duan4 ceng2
Sheng4 an1 de2 lie4 si1 Duan4 ceng2

definition: strike-slip fault (geology)/fault line where the two sides slide horizontally past one another
pinyin: zou3 xiang4 hua2 dong4 duan4 ceng2
dian4 nao3 duan4 ceng2 sao3 miao2

sentences.english: Endoscopic ultrasonography and computerized tomography demonstrated the lesion to be a cyst in nature.
sentences.chinese: 內視鏡超音波與電腦斷層檢查也證明此病竈爲囊狀物。

sentences.english: An experimental study on the gouge along Xiaojiang fault has been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 對小江斷裂帶的斷層泥進行了實驗研究。

sentences.english: The southern San Andreas Fault is considered "most primed to break".
sentences.chinese: 南部的聖安德里亞斯斷層被認爲是“最引突破”。

sentences.english: Aftershocks extended along the fault system in both directions.
sentences.chinese: 餘震沿着斷層系統向兩個方向延伸。

sentences.english: She had five double faults, including back-to-back doubles in two games.
sentences.chinese: 她有五雙，包括斷層，後端到早在雙打兩場比賽。

sentences.english: Tests, such as a computed tomography (CT) scan, may also reveal signs of injury.
sentences.chinese: 計算機斷層掃描等檢測也可能揭示損傷跡象。

sentences.english: According to Fan, changing the water level strains them.
sentences.chinese: 根據範曉的說法，水位的改變使斷層緊繃。

sentences.english: Turkey, lying atop the North Anatolian fault, has been plagued by earthquakes frequently.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其位於位於北安納托利亞斷層上，經常遭受地震。

sentences.english: The polygonal fault is tensional fault system with small throws, which is of nontectonic origin.
sentences.chinese: 多邊形斷層是一種非構造成因的斷距微小的張性斷層。

sentences.english: The polygonal fault is tensional fault system with small throws, which is of nontectonic origin.
sentences.chinese: 多邊形斷層是一種非構造成因的斷距微小的張性斷層。

sentences.english: The article introduces the fault structure in the Wajinwan coal mine, summarizes experience of excavating coal through the fault.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了大同煤礦集團公司挖金灣礦斷層構造情況。

sentences.english: The model ofthe relation between fault damaged coefficent and mining index is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了斷層破壞指數與開採指標的關係模型。

sentences.english: The New Madrid Fault line in fact runs up along the Seaway.
sentences.chinese: 新馬德里斷層帶實際沿着海道向上而行。

sentences.english: They are encased in a Slipspace field.
sentences.chinese: 他們被包圍在斷層空間區域。

sentences.english: It more or less goes perpendicular with the fault rupture of the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 海嘯的行進方向與地震斷層破裂帶通常會相互垂直。

sentences.english: The degree of formation denudation and fault activity are the key factors to oil and gas preservation.
sentences.chinese: 地層剝蝕程度和斷層的活動性是油氣保存的關鍵因素。

definition: arteries and veins/network of blood vessels/vascular system (of a plant or animal)/(fig.) fabric (i.e. underlying structure, as in "social fabric")/overall context
(fig.) gulf/chasm/wide gap/(originally) the Hong Canal in Henan, which in ancient times formed the border between enemies Chu 楚 and Han 漢|汉
to misjudge/error of judgment/incorrect ruling/miscarriage of justice
